skillTree.localised_description: The palanquins of Nurgle are ornate thrones decorated in mouldering finery and decaying cushions.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit takes no penalties when flanked.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: A colossal Daemon-insect, whose appearance is so repugnant it leaves festering scars upon the mind.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit takes no penalties when flanked.

skillTree.localised_description: The Fly Lord and his devotees despise Tzeentch, for his obsession with schemes and trickery are the polar opposite of Nurgle's delight in slow, musty stagnation.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Tzeentchian factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Tzeentchian factions

skillTree.localised_description: Anything fired at this vile Nurglish servant's immense girth must penetrate many folds of sweaty fat before they even have the slightest chance of piercing his flesh.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs single and multiple units

skillTree.localised_description: Grandfather Nurgle has a nauseating surprise in store for you...
Nurgleâ€™s chosen are supernaturally resilient.
The Lord of Pestilence loves each and every one of his children.
We leave only burning houses behind.
The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: The smiths have already completed their order, the workers are in position and the masons are ready to begin.
True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 1% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: 2% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: 4% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Itâ€™s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.
Youâ€™ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending
	(Hero's army)

	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Always watching.

skillTree.localised_description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +4%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit takes no penalties when flanked.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: From which species this one comes is very much open to question, so distorted have their features become through Grandfather Nurgle's loving caresses.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -25% for war beast units
Recruit rank: +3 for war beast units

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this one doesn't know about plagues, diseases, contagions, maladies, infections and epidemics simply isn't worth knowing.

effects.description:
Chance of a plague spreading: +5%
	(any army in province)
Melee defence: +4 for Plaguebearers of Nurgle and Exalted Plaguebearers of Nurgle units
Weapon strength: +10% for Plaguebearers of Nurgle and Exalted Plaguebearers of Nurgle units

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This nasty little concoction came from no one knows quite whence to spread the vilest pestilence, horrific, weeping buboes, and a terrifying, screaming death to all across the land.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Myriad open sores weep with festering, foetid pus, enabling Neiglen's foul plagues to infect quickly and spread faster than before.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy leadership aura size: -25%
	(enemy characters in region)

Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -4%
	(enemy armies in region)
